ns0:DryadDataFile.ns2:title: Analysis of dispersal distance in relation to coloration
ns0:DryadDataFile.ns2:description: Recruit ring= Identity of the individual that dispersed; dispersal distance: distance (m) between the nest where the recruit was reared and the nest where it bred for the first time; Year = year when born; Brood ID: identity of the nest where the recruit was raised; Sex=Sex of the recruit; Treatment: brood size manipulation; Father and mother color: 1 for dark melanin to 5 for light melanic
ns0:DryadDataFile.ns2:provenance: Step: dryadAcceptEditReject - action:dryadAcceptEditRejectAction Rejected by Dryad Queue(dryad.queue@gmail.com), reason: Submission of data to Dryad associated with American Naturalist requires that the journal first send a description of your manuscript to us.
